title: E3 Live Event Cancelled?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.01.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about E3's live event being cancelled, Elden Ring leaks, possible Square Enix remakes, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:02:.30 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO is recording live later today on Patreon then as always it’s out for everyone on Tuesday morning. It’s been a HUGE week of PlayStation news so you don’t want to miss this week’s episode.
Then, as always Kinda Funny Xcast went live over the weekend. You can join Snow Bichael Michael, Gary Whitta, and Parris Lilly as they go back and forth about Bethesda and what to expect from them.
This Month’s Patreon Platinum Tier Print is….https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids/status/1366440599985942530
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
James Davis, David Meintel, Mohammed Mohammed,The Nano Biologist, Frankfurter, Shiraz Razak, Patrick Higgins,Travis Gajkowski,Drew Gardiner, Dominic Shorter,Ginny Berndt,Joseph Soler,Katie Gallacher, &Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:30 - E3 2021's Live Event Has Been Cancelled... According to LA City Documents - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:18:58 -  Forever Entertainment is developing multiple remakes for Square Enix - Sal Romano @ Gematsu
00:28:20 - Ladies and gentlemen, we got Elden Ring leaks - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:31:30 - With Elden Ring news on the horizon, do we see this being a 2021 launch or further? Also do we think this is going to be a next gen game? - Best Friends Q:Neo Aoshi
00:37:07 - EA’s delayed the next Need for Speed - Owen S. Good @ Polygon
00:42:40 -  Ad
00:45:00 - Bandai Namco trademarks “Bandai Namco Next” - Stephen Tailby @ PushSquare
00:57:29 - We’ve got even more stories of Stadia’s struggle - Jay Peters @ The Verge
01:02:00 - Out today
01:02:50 - Squad Up:Greg(PS5) - GregoryGerdes
01:03:08 - You‘re Wrong
